text: Park Chu-Young (Hangul: 박주영, Hanja: 朴主永; born 10 July 1985), also written as Park Ju-Young or Park Ju-yeong, is a South Korean football player.FIFA.com, Park Chuyoung ; retrieved 2012-8-10. Park was a member of the Korean team in the 2008 Summer Olympics at Beijing. Sports Reference.com (SR/Olympics), "Park Ju-Yeong" ; retrieved 2012-8-10. Park played on the Korean men's football team in the 2012 Summer Olympics at London.London2012.com, Chuyoung Park ; retrieved 2012-8-10. His play was highlighted when he scored the first goal against Japan in the bronze medal match. "South Korea beats Japan 2-0 to get men’s Olympic football bronze," Washington Post (US).
